Text: The dj edit one doesnt end abruptly like this and the other one I have found that contain the 'talking" parts, however, they all end before the video is acutally over. this one cuts off right in the middle of luda saying face down ass up.  can someone upload the full video? that would be awesome! :)

also.. http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5417331/Ludacris_-_How_Low_%282010%29_JB59 has better audio and video quality. and my bad about it ending early.. it appears that the song is over but then it starts over again .. must just be how the video is.. ludas work in the mirror is never done i guess lol
